page.title: 11Stagsden,Social Life.
page.content: Many locals meet and chat at The Royal George which now has a 'Kids Cabin' and childrens play area in the garden. For those who enjoy more formal leisure activities there is the W.I. who are celebrating 39 years since their formation with a birthday fashion show,or the Cricket Club. The Golden Friendship Club provides the opportunity for about 18 senior citizens to meet fortnightly for dominoes, beetle, bingo, or a speaker. There are 2 Keep Fit Classes-one particularly for the over 60's, held in the Community Centre which also sees a weekly "Coffee Pot" morning where around 20 locals meet for coffee,a chat and can borrow books from the centre's paperback library.Fund-raising for the Community Centre has meant many more social activities this year.
